name: Love In The Gaming Club
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 41. The theme for Ludum Dare 41 was "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres". This game fits the theme by combining the visual novel genre with the platformer genre.

This game is a short single-player experience. In this game, players have the option to woo one of four girls in a playthrough. To do this, players must complete a level from a platformer video game for them.

Features:

* Branching storylines. Wooing a different girl in each playthrough causes different results in the story to occur. 

* Entertaining dialog. 

* Excellent and intuitive UI.

* Amazing platformer gameplay.

* Great soundeffects.
